revised_title: An Inquiry into the Mechanics of the Heart's Motion and Function
tldr: The author examines the mechanics of the heart's motion and contraction, exploring the role of fluid matter, nerves, and muscle fibers in the heart's function. The author also investigates the alternate motion of the heart's auricles and ventricles, concluding that the heart's structure and function are closely related to those of other muscles in the body.
